resources.string:
Health Case Studies Protoype App
By Mitch Myburgh, Mbongeni Ncube, Sindiswa Makiwane
The App allows the user to learn by doing Health Case studies
The app uses open code for the file loader taken from: http://www.scorchworks.com/Blog/simple-file-dialog-for-android-applications/ and www.codeproject.com/Articles/547636/Android-Ready-to-use-simple-directory-chooser-dial
